title: 801-shiki☆Chuugakusei Nikki: Tonari no Hina-chan
original_name: 801 式 ☆ 中学生日記 ～となりのひなちゃん～
sinopse:
Being 14 is special!

From the boom of the fujoshi theme led by Tonari no 801-chan, 801-chan's sister, Hina-chan finally debuts.

Be cute, laugh out loud, and fall in love. The curtains of a fujoshi's junior high school life rises!
